text: 無茶かもしれませんが / 無理ではないと思います
translation: It may be reckless, but I don't think it's impossible.
grammar: かもしれません expresses uncertainty ('may be', 'might be'); ではない negates the noun 無理

text: 分かった / 総員退化 / 繰り返す総員退化 / 各フリゲートは / 恐竜する急事を急げ / しかしエヴァはどうする
translation: Understood. All hands, evacuate. I repeat, all hands evacuate. All frigates prepare to evacuate urgently. But what about the Eva?
grammar: Command form with imperative 急げ; どうする asks 'what to do about'

text: 心配いりません。あの二人でしたら。 / ちょっとあんた、人の身動き! 勝手に動かさないでよ!
translation: No need to worry. If it's those two... Hey you, that's my body! Don't move it without permission!
grammar: いりません means 'not needed'; でしたら conditional 'if it's'; ないでよ is casual negative request

text: 二人とも、作戦内容。いいわね。 / なんとかやってみるよ! 頼むわ!
translation: You two, here's the operation plan. Got it? We'll manage somehow! I'm counting on you!
grammar: いいわね is feminine confirmation seeking 'okay?'; やってみる means 'try doing'

text: 前艦、キングス弁を抜きました。 Z地点に対し、人口開始。
translation: Forward ships have released the kingston valves. Commencing approach to Point Z.
grammar: ました past tense polite form; に対し means 'toward, against'

text: 了解。ケーブル、リバース!
translation: Roger. Cable, reverse!
grammar: Command form with katakana loanword リバース (reverse)

text: レバー!無情開始!接触まであと70!
translation: Lever! Reeling in begun! 70 until contact!
grammar: まで indicates 'until'; あと shows remaining amount

text: ちょっといつまで触ってんのよ!どいてったら!
translation: Hey, how long are you going to keep touching me?! Move, I said!

vocabulary.meaning: to move aside, get out of the way

grammar: てんのよ is casual feminine progressive question form; ったら emphasizes repeated request

text: でも早く口をこじ開けないと僕らもやられちゃうよ!
translation: But if we don't pry its mouth open quickly, we'll get killed too!
grammar: ないと conditional 'if we don't'; ちゃう is colloquial contraction of てしまう (regrettable completion)

text: 接触まであと60! / 舌の口は? / また開かん!
translation: 60 until contact! How about the target's mouth? Still won't open!
grammar: まで indicates 'until'; ん is informal negative (開かない)

text: 戦艦2隻、目標に対し、人工中! / レヴァ、浮上中、接触まであと50! / ダメだ!もう時間がないわ!
translation: Two battleships approaching target! Lever ascending, 50 until contact! No good! We're out of time!
grammar: 中 suffix indicates ongoing action 'in the midst of'; もう emphasizes 'already, now'

text: 目標はテンペストの鑑定を通過! / 間に合わないわ!早く! / 変なこと考えないでよ! / なにが? / とにかく考えを集中させるんだよ! / わかってる!
translation: Target has passed through the Tempest's bow! We won't make it! Hurry! Don't think weird things! What? Anyway, just concentrate! I know!

vocabulary.meaning: to be in time, make it

grammar: 間に合わない negative form 'won't make it'; させる causative form 'make (something) concentrate'; んだよ explanatory emphasis

text: スーパ
translation: Super...
grammar: Incomplete utterance, likely cut off mid-word

text: そうね。 / ん?ミサト? / んー。 / これは本当に貴重だわ。
translation: That's right. Hm? Misato? Mm. This is truly valuable.
grammar: そうね feminine agreement; だわ feminine assertive ending

text: ピッピー! / いやー、あんな感じ! / シンクロチの記録更新じゃない?
translation: Perfect! Well, that was something! Isn't that a synchro rate record?
grammar: じゃない seeks confirmation 'isn't it?'

text: たった7秒間じゃ、カジバのバカ力でしょ。 / ねぇ、カジさんは? / 先にトンズラ。もう本部についてるわよ! / あんなバカ!
translation: It was only 7 seconds, probably just dumb luck in a pinch. Hey, where's Kaji? He ran off ahead. He's already at headquarters! That idiot!
grammar: じゃ is topic particle; でしょ seeks agreement; についてる means 'has arrived at'

text: いやはや波乱に満ちた船旅でしたよ
translation: Well well, it was quite an eventful sea voyage.
grammar: に満ちた modifies 船旅 as 'filled with turbulence'; でしたよ polite past with emphasis

text: やはりこれのせいですか
translation: Was it because of this, as expected?
grammar: のせい attributes cause/blame; ですか polite question

text: すでにここまで復元されています / 高架ベークライトで固めてありますが
translation: It's already been restored to this extent. It's been solidified with heated bakelite, but...
grammar: されています passive + ongoing state; てあります indicates completed state; が indicates contrast

text: 生きています間違いなく
translation: It's alive, without a doubt.
grammar: ています ongoing state 'is alive'; 間違いなく adverbially modifies the statement

text: 人類補完計画の要ですね / そうだ最初の人間アダムだよ
translation: It's the key to the Human Instrumentality Project, isn't it? That's right, it's Adam, the first human.
grammar: の marks possessive/relation; ですね seeks confirmation; だよ casual assertive

text: へーんま、顔に似合わずイケスカン女やったな / ぁ。
translation: Hmm, despite her looks, she was quite an unpleasant woman, wasn't she? Ah.
grammar: に似合わず means 'contrary to, not matching'; やったな Kansai dialect past 'was, wasn't she'

text: ま、俺たちはもう会うこともないさ。 / 先生は仕事やからしゃあないわな。 / どうじゃそれでほんま。
translation: Well, we won't be meeting again anyway. Can't be helped since it's her job. How about that, really.
grammar: こともない emphasizes 'not even'; やから Kansai 'because'; わな seeking agreement

text: ソウリュー アスカラングレーです / よろしく
translation: I'm Soryu Asuka Langley. Pleased to meet you.
grammar: です polite copula for self-introduction

text: 心が天でバラバラのアスカとシンジは / 使徒にコテンパンに乗されて / しまう / ミサトは二人の完璧なユニゾンを目指し / 一景を講じた / 次回 瞬間 心重ねて
translation: Asuka and Shinji, whose hearts are completely at odds, end up getting thoroughly beaten by an Angel. Misato takes measures to achieve perfect unison between the two. Next time: Moment, Hearts Aligned.
grammar: てしまう indicates regrettable completion; を目指し means 'aiming for'; 重ねて stacking/aligning

text: この次もサービスサービス
translation: Next time too, service, service!
grammar: も particle indicates 'also, too'; repetition for emphasis
